oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge certificate for Pvt. William Travis Simmons, Co. I, 4th Tenn. Cav., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge certificate for Pvt. William Travis Simmons. Simmons was born about 1837 to Thomas and Nancy Simmons. He enlisted in Co. I, 4th Tenn. Cav., USA, on August 15, 1863, and served until his discharge on January 11, 1865. According to the 1890; "Special Schedule" of the U.S. Census, Simmons incurred kidney disease and deafness during the war. He died on July 30, 1902, in Bledsoe County, Tennessee. He is buried in Beach Cemetery (Bledsoe County, Tenn."
